title: High-efficiency detection of primary amine-based chiral molecules by a facile aldimine condensation reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31820-31824
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06291D, Paper

Yang Yu, Aiyan Shi, Tongtong Wang, Tiefeng Wang, Fei Xu
A pH-sensitive fluorane dye was developed to be reacted with chiral molecules through an aldimine condensation reaction. After the mixing operation, the chiral features of detected molecules could be facilely determined by spectral analysis.
